actions.args: {"handle": "neardevnews", "community_addon": {"id": "sjhpwx", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Contribute to NEAR Dev NEWS \\\\u{1f91d}\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"subtitle\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"content\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nNEAR Dev NEWS is our developer newsletter dedicated to sharing insights, updates, and resources within the NEAR Protocol developer community. There are numerous ways you can contribute to NEAR Dev NEWS and help shape weekly updates.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n1. **Articles and Tutorials**: Share your expertise and knowledge by writing articles and tutorials related to NEAR Protocol\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n2. **Project Showcases**: Showcase your projects and applications built on NEAR Protocol.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n3. **Event Announcements and Reports**: Keep the community informed about upcoming NEAR-related events, workshops, hackathons, and conferences. Additionally, share your experiences and key takeaways from events you\\\\\\'ve attended.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n4. **Feedback and Suggestions**: Share your thoughts on the newsletter\\\\\\'s content, format, and topics. Additionally, suggest ideas for future editions, highlight areas for improvement, and provide constructive criticism to help us better serve the community.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n5. **Sharing and Promotion**: Spread the word about NEAR Dev NEWS within your networks and communities. Share articles, tutorials, and updates on social media platforms, developer forums, and blockchain-related communities.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n  \\\\\\\\n ##### Submit all relevant links via our \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"Discussions page\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\" and get featured! \\\\\\\\n **Be sure to include a brief bio and any resources.**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"textAlign\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"left\\\\\\\"}", "display_name": "How to get featured \\\\u{2728}"}}

{"id": 2, "body": {"name": "DevHub Developer Contributor report by Thomas for 03/11/2024 \\\\u{2013}\\\\u{a0}04/12/2024", "summary": "Contributions to devhub and near ecosystem. Mostly around the new proposal flow, filter, search, pagination, the indexer. And other issues related to communities pages and addons.", "category": "DevDAO Platform", "timeline": {"status": "REVIEW", "sponsor_requested_review": false, "reviewer_completed_attestation": false}, "supervisor": "theori.near", "description": "## Summary of Activities\\\\n\\\\n**Week 1: March 11 \\\\u{2013}\\\\u{a0}March 15**\\\\n\\\\nMarch 13 - 5 hours\\\\n- Indexer [682](https://github.com/orgs/NEAR-DevHub/projects/4/views/1?pane=issue&itemId=55216536)\\\\n- Standup\\\\n\\\\nMarch 14 - 8 hours\\\\n- Call with Bo about indexer\\\\n- Finished the indexer version [lima](https://near.org/dataplatform.near/widget/QueryApi.App?selectedIndexerPath=thomasguntenaar.near/devhub_proposals_lima)\\\\n- and version kilo + mining\\\\n\\\\nMarch 15 - 3 hrs\\\\n- Proposal filters and sort [690](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/690)\\\\n\\\\nMarch 16 - 3 hrs \\\\n- Proposal filters and sort [690](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/690)\\\\n---\\\\n\\\\nTotal hours: 19\\\\n  \\\\n**Week 2: March 18 \\\\u{2013}\\\\u{a0}March 22**\\\\n\\\\nMarch 19 - 1 hour\\\\n- Created PR [694](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/694)\\\\n\\\\nMarch 20 - 2 hours\\\\n- Fix issues with PR [694](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/694)\\\\n- Work on pagination for issue [690](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/690)\\\\n- Reviewed [693](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/693)\\\\n\\\\nMarch 21 - 4 hours\\\\n- Made infinite scroll on proposal\\\\n- Merged [694](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/694) finishing issue [690](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/690)\\\\n- Standup\\\\n\\\\nMarch 22 - 1 hours\\\\n- Fix test for pagination\\\\n- Reviewed [696](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/696)\\\\n- Reviewed [701](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/701)\\\\n\\\\nMarch 23 - 0 hr\\\\n- Reviewed [702](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/702) from Megha\\\\n\\\\nMarch 24 - 0 hr\\\\n- Reviewed [704](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/704) from Peter\\\\n---\\\\n\\\\nTotal hours: 8\\\\n\\\\n**Week 3: March 25 \\\\u{2013}\\\\u{a0}March 29**\\\\n\\\\nMarch 26 - 1 hr\\\\n- Started working on all announcements and discussions [692](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/692) \\\\n\\\\nMarch 27 - 1 hour\\\\n- Standup 30 min\\\\n- Finish new feed [692](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/692) \\\\n\\\\nMarch 29 - 4 hours\\\\n- Started working on bug ordering community announcements/discussions [715](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/715) \\\\n---\\\\n\\\\nTotal hours: 6\\\\n\\\\n**Week 4: April 2 - April 7**\\\\n\\\\n2 april - 4 hrs\\\\n- Continued working on all announcements and discussions on DevHub [692](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/692)\\\\n- Started working on communities admins want to choose which tabs to enable [709](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/709)\\\\n- Finished issue [715](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/715)\\\\n\\\\n3 april - 3 hrs\\\\n- Standup call\\\\n- Created issue [721](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/721)\\\\n- Looked into the indexer outage\\\\n\\\\n6 April - 1 hr\\\\n- Forking indexer due to outage \\\\n- Created PR [722](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/722)\\\\n\\\\n7 April - 5 hrs\\\\n- Migration of default tabs [709](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/709)\\\\n- Bootstrap [neardevhub-proposals-indexer](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-proposals-indexer) repository\\\\n---\\\\n\\\\nTotal hours: 13\\\\n\\\\n**Week 5: April 8 -  April 12**\\\\n\\\\n8 April - 5 hours\\\\n- Finish [709](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/709)\\\\n- Created PR [719](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/709) for new feed\\\\n- Created PR  [106](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-contract/pull/106) & [723](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/723) disabling community tabs\\\\n\\\\n9 April - 6 hours\\\\n- Finish [692](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/692)\\\\n- Fix issues with PR [719](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/719)\\\\n- Fix issues with PR [723](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/723) \\\\n- Reviewed PR [729](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/729) from Megha\\\\n- Closed PR [106](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-contract/pull/106) and closed [723](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/723)\\\\n\\\\n10 April 1,5 hrs\\\\n-  Created a second PR [#730](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/730) for [709](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/709)\\\\n- Call With Frol about new Blog\\\\n\\\\n11 April - 5 hrs\\\\n- Call With Ori\\\\n- Created and finished [737](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/737)\\\\n- Researched new Blog\\\\n\\\\n12 April - 5,5 hrs\\\\n - Resolve issue [587](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/587) in PR [730](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/730)\\\\n - Plan details and estimation blog\\\\n - Reviewed PR [736](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/736)\\\\n - Finish feedback [737](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/737)\\\\n---\\\\n\\\\nTotal hours: 23 hours\\\\n## Cost\\\\n\\\\n- Total hours: 19 + 8 + 6 + 13 + 23 = 69\\\\n- Rate: $100/hour ~ \\\\u{20ac}90/h is an average rate for a medior freelance front end web3 developer in the Netherlands ranging from 35 (absolute beginner) to 150 (senior) [for example](https://zzpservicedesk.nl/uurtarief-freelance-developer/)\\\\n- Total amount: $6900 USD", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "thomasguntenaar.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "6900", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "NEAR"}, "labels": []}

{"id": 12, "timeline": {"status": "FUNDED", "payouts": ["https://nearblocks.io/txns/E3FGXWgmr9rAR8mgvnPFS8jBTH7jbmegkyQtVC7mHjNv"], "kyc_verified": true, "test_transaction_sent": true, "sponsor_requested_review": false, "trustees_released_payment": true, "request_for_trustees_created": false, "reviewer_completed_attestation": false}}

{"body": {"name": "PizzaDAO Events in Lima + Denver", "summary": "NEAR Dev Hub continued its PizzaDAO collaboration with two events: one in Lima and one in Denver. Both events were hugely successful, with over 150 attendees in Lima and more than 700 in Denver. \\\\n\\\\nVideo from Denver: https://twitter.com/Pizza_DAO/status/1772294489907814478\\\\nVideo from Lima: https://twitter.com/Pizza_DAO/status/1757427978550616078", "category": "Events & Hackathons", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": "bpolania.near", "description": "**PizzaDAOxNearDevHub**\\\\nOver the past three years, PizzaDAO has traveled worldwide, organizing blockchain ecosystem events on every populated continent. These events have cultivated valuable relationships for the positive development of the web3 community, creating opportunities for knowledge sharing, networking, and fostering new connections among attendees worldwide.\\\\n\\\\nWe aim to throw a great pizza parties at ETH Lima and ETH Denver in partnership with NearCampus and NearDevHub, capitalizing on the synergy between our organizations to promote growth and development within the ecosystem.\\\\n\\\\n**Objectives:**\\\\nProduce events during ETH Lima and ETH Denver:\\\\nOrganize and execute a side events during ETH Lima, ensuring the event provides valuable insights and networking opportunities and contributes to the overall success of the NEAR ecosystem.\\\\n\\\\nPromote the NEAR Dev Hub Program and Forge New Strategic Alliances:\\\\nIncrease awareness by showcasing NEAR Dev Hub at the event. Initiate and cultivate strategic partnerships with key stakeholders in the web3 community and other relevant industries during the event.\\\\n\\\\nBring Together the Web3 Community and Local University Community:\\\\nFacilitate the convergence of the web3 community attending ETH events with the local university community. Encourage interaction, knowledge sharing, and collaboration between these two communities to foster a broader understanding of the web3 ecosystem. By achieving these objectives, PizzaDAO aims to contribute to the growth and development of the web3 ecosystem and create lasting connections and partnerships that benefit both the NEAR Dev Hub program and the broader community.\\\\n\\\\n**Event Details:**\\\\nETH Lima / https://ethlimaday.org/\\\\nThis event was on February 3rd from 7:00 PM to 11:00 PM at the \\\\\\\"NOW\\\\\\\" art gallery 500 meters from the main event. We showcased the local web3 communities during the event, organize an NFT expo, and worked with NounsAmigos (a Spanish-speaking Nouns community). We hosted 150+ attendees.\\\\n\\\\nETH Denver / https://www.ethdenver.com/\\\\nThis event was on February 28th from 6:00 PM to 9:00 PM at the historic Sports Castle. We hosted 700+ attendees and Boris spoke about NEAR briefly at the event.\\\\n\\\\nThe preparation for these events took place over a number of month, considering the local communities involved, emphasizing the importance of contacts, suppliers, and networks in ensuring event success.\\\\n\\\\nEach event had a unique graphic designed by a local illustrator from the web3 ecosystem.\\\\n\\\\nWe produced quality post-event videos for each event:\\\\n[Denver](https://twitter.com/Pizza_DAO/status/1772294489907814478)\\\\n[Lima](https://twitter.com/Pizza_DAO/status/1757427978550616078)\\\\n\\\\n**Lima Budget: $6,000**\\\\n* Venue Rental + Furniture: $2.070\\\\n* Security and Cleaning $200\\\\n* Catering: $1.100\\\\n* Technical: $600\\\\n* Graphics: $700\\\\n* Public Relations and Marketing $200\\\\n* Staff and Production $1310\\\\n* Activities: Musical performances, artistic exhibitions, talks, brand presentations, etc.\\\\n\\\\t* This item was paid for by another sponsor.\\\\n* Host and DJ\\\\n\\\\t* This item was paid for by another sponsor.\\\\n* Registrations: Photographer, video recording, and editing.\\\\n\\\\t* This item was paid for by another sponsor.\\\\n\\\\n[Link to Denver budget](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/13JM4x1fThsKVyPuL5X-SGafpXSeCVCVk4z1EagS2MAE/edit#gid=1374391718)", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "pizzadao.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "8500", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": []}

{"data": {"devhub.near": {"post": {"main": "{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"text\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"We have just received a new *Events & Hackathons* proposal.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**By**: @pizzadao.near\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Title**: \\\\u{201c}PizzaDAO Events in Lima + Denver\\\\u{201c}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Summary**:\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nNEAR Dev Hub continued its PizzaDAO collaboration with two events: one in Lima and one in Denver. Both events were hugely successful, with over 150 attendees in Lima and more than 700 in Denver. \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nVideo from Denver: https://twitter.com/Pizza_DAO/status/1772294489907814478\\\\\\\\nVideo from Lima: https://twitter.com/Pizza_DAO/status/1757427978550616078\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nRead the full proposal and share your feedback on [DevHub](/devhub.near/widget/app?page=proposal&id=45)\\\\\\\"}"}, "index": {"post": "{\\\\\\\"key\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"main\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"value\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\"}}"}}}}

Both events were hugely successful, with over 150 attendees in Lima and more than 700 in Denver. \\\\n\\\\nVideo from Denver: https://twitter.com/Pizza_DAO/status/1772294489907814478\\\\nVideo from Lima: https://twitter.com/Pizza_DAO/status/1757427978550616078", "category": "Events & Hackathons", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "editor_id": "pizzadao.near", "timestamp": "1713038049767197684", "supervisor": "bpolania.near", "description": "**PizzaDAOxNearDevHub**\\\\nOver the past three years, PizzaDAO has traveled worldwide, organizing blockchain ecosystem events on every populated continent. These events have cultivated valuable relationships for the positive development of the web3 community, creating opportunities for knowledge sharing, networking, and fostering new connections among attendees worldwide.\\\\n\\\\nWe aim to throw a great pizza parties at ETH Lima and ETH Denver in partnership with NearCampus and NearDevHub, capitalizing on the synergy between our organizations to promote growth and development within the ecosystem.\\\\n\\\\n**Objectives:**\\\\nProduce events during ETH Lima and ETH Denver:\\\\nOrganize and execute a side events during ETH Lima, ensuring the event provides valuable insights and networking opportunities and contributes to the overall success of the NEAR ecosystem.\\\\n\\\\nPromote the NEAR Dev Hub Program and Forge New Strategic Alliances:\\\\nIncrease awareness by showcasing NEAR Dev Hub at the event. Initiate and cultivate strategic partnerships with key stakeholders in the web3 community and other relevant industries during the event.\\\\n\\\\nBring Together the Web3 Community and Local University Community:\\\\nFacilitate the convergence of the web3 community attending ETH events with the local university community. By achieving these objectives, PizzaDAO aims to contribute to the growth and development of the web3 ecosystem and create lasting connections and partnerships that benefit both the NEAR Dev Hub program and the broader community.\\\\n\\\\n**Event Details:**\\\\nETH Lima / https://ethlimaday.org/\\\\nThis event was on February 3rd from 7:00 PM to 11:00 PM at the \\\\\\\"NOW\\\\\\\" art gallery 500 meters from the main event. We showcased the local web3 communities during the event, organize an NFT expo, and worked with NounsAmigos (a Spanish-speaking Nouns community). We hosted 150+ attendees.\\\\n\\\\nETH Denver / https://www.ethdenver.com/\\\\nThis event was on February 28th from 6:00 PM to 9:00 PM at the historic Sports Castle. We hosted 700+ attendees and Boris spoke about NEAR briefly at the event.\\\\n\\\\nThe preparation for these events took place over a number of month, considering the local communities involved, emphasizing the importance of contacts, suppliers, and networks in ensuring event success.\\\\n\\\\nEach event had a unique graphic designed by a local illustrator from the web3 ecosystem.\\\\n\\\\nWe produced quality post-event videos for each event:\\\\n[Denver](https://twitter.com/Pizza_DAO/status/1772294489907814478)\\\\n[Lima](https://twitter.com/Pizza_DAO/status/1757427978550616078)\\\\n\\\\n**Lima Budget: $6,000**\\\\n* Venue Rental + Furniture: $2.070\\\\n* Security and Cleaning $200\\\\n* Catering: $1.100\\\\n* Technical: $600\\\\n* Graphics: $700\\\\n* Public Relations and Marketing $200\\\\n* Staff and Production $1310\\\\n* Activities: Musical performances, artistic exhibitions, talks, brand presentations, etc.\\\\n\\\\t* This item was paid for by another sponsor.\\\\n* Host and DJ\\\\n\\\\t* This item was paid for by another sponsor.\\\\n* Registrations: Photographer, video recording, and editing.\\\\n\\\\t* This item was paid for by another sponsor.\\\\n\\\\n[Link to Denver budget](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/13JM4x1fThsKVyPuL5X-SGafpXSeCVCVk4z1EagS2MAE/edit#gid=1374391718)", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "pizzadao.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "8500", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "author_id": "pizzadao.near", "snapshot_history": [], "social_db_post_block_height": "0"}}
